THE RIGHTS OF AN HEIR WHOSE GIFT OR LEGACY IS NOT INCLUDED IN HIS OR HER HEREDITARY PORTION
(1) When it is the will of the testator that a gift or a legacy to an heir is not included in his or her hereditary portion, the heir shall keep the gift or legacy and share the estate with the rest of the heirs as if the gift or legacy did not exist.
(2) When there are forced heirs and it is the decedent's will that a gift or legacy to an heir is not included in his or her hereditary portion, the heir in question may keep the gift or legacy, within the limits of the disposable portion.
